message:

### The error may exist in com/lingDream/justDoIT/mapper/EmployeesMapper.java (best guess)
### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM employees
### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'jdi_employees.employees' doesn't exist
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'jdi_employees.employees' doesn't exist
